sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnntwrksvcmntrng ( sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #sysIp# , #sysPort# , #sysNm# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #mntrngSttus# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnntwrksvcmntrng SET sys_ip = #sysIp# , sys_port = #sysPort# , sys_nm = #sysNm# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE 1 = 1 AND sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort#
sqlMap.select: SELECT sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort#

SELECT sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE 1=1
sys_ip = #searchKeyword#
sys_port LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY sys_ip DESC , sys_port DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrng WHERE 1=1
sys_ip = #searchKeyword#
sys_port LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
